mapper.sql: id, task_no, status, file_name, url, descr, username, create_name, create_time, update_name, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT o.id as id, o.task_no as task_no, o.status as status, o.file_name as file_name, o.url as url, o.descr as descr, o.username as username, o.create_name as create_name, o.create_time as create_time, o.update_name as update_name, o.update_time as update_time FROM sys_message o
mapper.insert: insert into sys_message (id, task_no, status, file_name, url, descr, username, create_name, create_time, update_name, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
task_no,

mapper.update:
update sys_message
task_no = #{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_message set task_no = #{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
